block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 伺服马达 Servo Motor 使用0至180度伺服马达 马达将根据设定值旋转0至180度 0 to 180 degree Servo Motor is used Motor will rotate to between 0 to 180 degree according to value set

block.comment: 从 180 回到 0 需要更长的时间 from 180 back to 0 needs longer time

scripts.comment: 测试伺服电机指向 0 至 180 之间的各种角度 test the servo motor point to various angles between 0 to 180

block.comment: 验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap

scripts.comment: 确认指针指向中间 set the pointer point at middle
测试确认指针指向预期方向 test to confirm the pointer points to the direction as expected
测试伺服电机指向 0 至 180 之间的各种角度 test the servo motor point to various angles between 0 to 180
